Text: «Якщо ти не жуєш тімбербітс, ти взагалі бобер?» — Ма' Нгонель
Comment: Ma' Ngonel is an almost legendary figure - a beaver grandma, known for her stern hand, cooking skills and respect among both kits and adult beavers. Her name is an inside joke, as our community constantly demands an addition of catapults, mangonels etc.
